role.argrole: time arg0 is as late as

example.parse: (IP (NP-TPC (NP (NT 九九年)) (NP-PN (NR 澳门)) (NP (NN 回归))) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 则)) (VP (VP (VV 迟至) (NP-OBJ (NT 八○年代) (NN 中期))) (VP (ADVP (AD 才)) (VP (VV 展开) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 培训) (NP-OBJ (NN 本土) (NN 人才)))))))))
example.arg: 九九年 澳门 回归
